name: The Odyssey
description: Epic poem about Odysseus' journey home after the Trojan War.

name: The Twelve Labors of Hercules
description: Series of episodes concerning a penance carried out by Hercules.

name: The Iliad
description: Epic poem set during the Trojan War.

name: The Argonautica
description: Epic poem about Jason and the Argonauts' quest for the Golden Fleece.

name: Beowulf
description: Epic poem about the hero Beowulf who fights Grendel and a dragon.

name: The Tale of King Arthur
description: Legends about the leader of the Knights of the Round Table.

name: The Ramayana
description: Epic about Prince Rama's quest to rescue his wife Sita.

name: The Mahabharata
description: Epic about the Kurukshetra War and the fates of the Kaurava and the Pandava princes.

name: The Epic of Gilgamesh
description: Epic poem about the hero Gilgamesh's quest for immortality.

description: Epic about the hero Cu Chulainn defending Ulster from the armies of Connacht.
